verses.verse: And he spoke <S%G3004><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> to them to this <S%G3588><s%> end, that men ought <S%G1163><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> to pray, <S%G4336><s%> and not to faint; <S%G1573><s%>
Saying, <S%G3004><s%> There was in a city <S%G4172><s%> a judge, <S%G2923><s%> which feared <S%G5399><s%> not God, <S%G2316><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> regarded <S%G1788><s%> man: <S%G444><s%>
And there was a widow <S%G5503><s%> in that city; <S%G4172><s%> and she came <S%G2064><s%> to him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Avenge <S%G1556><s%> me of my <S%G3450><s%> adversary. <S%G476><s%>

And he would <S%G2309><s%> not for a while: <S%G5550><s%> but afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> Though <S%G1499><s%> I fear <S%G5399><s%> not God, <S%G2316><s%> nor <S%G3756><s%> regard <S%G1788><s%> man; <S%G444><s%>

Yet <S%G1065><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> troubles <S%G3930><s%> <S%G2873><s%> me, I will avenge <S%G1556><s%> her, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> by her continual <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5056><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> she weary <S%G5299><s%> me.
And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the unjust <S%G93><s%> judge <S%G2923><s%> said. <S%G3004><s%>

And shall not God <S%G2316><s%> avenge <S%G4160><s%> his own elect, <S%G1588><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> cry <S%G994><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and night <S%G3571><s%> to him, though <S%G2532><s%> he bear <S%G3114><s%> long <S%G3114><s%> with them?

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you that he will avenge <S%G4160><s%> them speedily. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> when the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> shall he find <S%G2147><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth? <S%G1093><s%>

And he spoke <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> to certain <S%G5100><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> trusted <S%G3982><s%> in themselves <S%G1438><s%> that they were righteous, <S%G1342><s%> and despised <S%G1848><s%> others: <S%G3062><s%>

Two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G444><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> to pray; <S%G4336><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> a Pharisee, <S%G5330><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> a publican. <S%G5057><s%>

The Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and prayed <S%G4336><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> with himself, <S%G1438><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> I thank <S%G2168><s%> you, that I am <S%G1510><s%> not as other <S%G3062><s%> men <S%G444><s%> are, extortionists, <S%G727><s%> unjust, <S%G94><s%> adulterers, <S%G3432><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as this <S%G3778><s%> publican. <S%G5057><s%>
I fast <S%G3522><s%> twice <S%G1364><s%> in the week, <S%G4521><s%> I give tithes <S%G586><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that I possess. <S%G2932><s%>

And the publican, <S%G5057><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off, would <S%G2309><s%> not lift <S%G1869><s%> up so <S%G3761><s%> much <S%G3761><s%> as his eyes <S%G3788><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but smote <S%G5180><s%> on his breast, <S%G4738><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> be merciful <S%G2433><s%> to me a sinner. <S%G268><s%>

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, this <S%G3778><s%> man went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to his house <S%G3624><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> rather than <S%G2228><s%> the other: <S%G1565><s%> for every <S%G3956><s%> one that exalts <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be abased; <S%G5013><s%> and he that humbles <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

And they brought <S%G4374><s%> to him also <S%G2532><s%> infants, <S%G1025><s%> that he would touch <S%G680><s%> them: but when his disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them.

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> them to him, and said, <S%G2036><s%> Suffer <S%G863><s%> little <S%G3813><s%> children <S%G3813><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to me, and forbid <S%G2967><s%> them not: for of such <S%G5108><s%> is the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall not receive <S%G1209><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> as a little <S%G3813><s%> child <S%G3813><s%> shall in no <S%G3364><s%> wise enter <S%G1525><s%> therein. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And a certain <S%G5100><s%> ruler <S%G758><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> to inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life? <S%G2222><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Why <S%G5101><s%> call <S%G3004><s%> you me good? <S%G18><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> is good, <S%G18><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> that is, God. <S%G2316><s%>

You know <S%G1492><s%> the commandments, <S%G1785><s%> Do not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> Do not kill, <S%G5407><s%> Do not steal, <S%G2813><s%> Do not bear <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> witness, <S%G5576><s%> Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and your mother.
And he said, <S%G2036><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> have I kept <S%G5442><s%> from my youth <S%G3503><s%> up.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Yet <S%G2089><s%> lack <S%G3007><s%> you one <S%G1520><s%> thing: sell <S%G4453><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that you have, <S%G2192><s%> and distribute <S%G1239><s%> to the poor, <S%G4434><s%> and you shall have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and come, <S%G1204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> me.
And when he heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G5023><s%> he was very <S%G4970><s%> sorrowful: <S%G4036><s%> for he was very <S%G4970><s%> rich. <S%G4145><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that he was very <S%G4036><s%> sorrowful, <S%G4036><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> hardly <S%G1423><s%> shall they that have <S%G2192><s%> riches <S%G5536><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>

For it is easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1525><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> a needle's <S%G4476><s%> eye, <S%G5168><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich <S%G4145><s%> man to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And they that heard <S%G191><s%> it said, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> be saved? <S%G4982><s%>
And he said, <S%G2036><s%> The things which are impossible <S%G102><s%> with men <S%G444><s%> are possible <S%G1415><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> See, <S%G2400><s%> we have left <S%G863><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> you.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, There is no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> that has left <S%G863><s%> house, <S%G3614><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> parents, <S%G1118><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God's <S%G2316><s%> sake, <S%G1752><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall not receive <S%G618><s%> manifold <S%G4179><s%> more <S%G4179><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> present time, <S%G2540><s%> and in the world <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> everlasting. <S%G166><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he took <S%G3880><s%> to him the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we go <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> things that are written <S%G1125><s%> by the prophets <S%G4396><s%> concerning the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall be accomplished. <S%G5055><s%>

For he shall be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> and shall be mocked, <S%G1702><s%> and spitefully <S%G5195><s%> entreated, <S%G5195><s%> and spitted <S%G1716><s%> on: <S%G1716><s%>
And they shall whip <S%G3146><s%> him, and put <S%G615><s%> him to death: <S%G615><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>

And they understood <S%G4920><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> things: and this <S%G5124><s%> saying <S%G4487><s%> was hid <S%G2928><s%> from them, neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> they the things which were spoken. <S%G3004><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that as he was come <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to Jericho, <S%G2410><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> man sat <S%G2521><s%> by the way <S%G3598><s%> side <S%G3844><s%> begging: <S%G4319><s%>
And hearing <S%G191><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> pass <S%G1279><s%> by, he asked <S%G4441><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> it meant. <S%G1498><s%>
And they told <S%G518><s%> him, that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> passes <S%G3928><s%> by.
And he cried, <S%G994><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> you Son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me.

And they which went <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him, that he should hold <S%G4623><s%> his peace: <S%G4623><s%> but he cried <S%G2896><s%> so <S%G3123><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> the more, <S%G3123><s%> You son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me.
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood, <S%G2476><s%> and commanded <S%G2753><s%> him to be brought <S%G71><s%> to him: and when he was come <S%G1448><s%> near, <S%G1448><s%> he asked <S%G1905><s%> him,

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you that I shall do <S%G4160><s%> to you? And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that I may receive <S%G308><s%> my sight. <S%G308><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Receive <S%G308><s%> your sight: <S%G308><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has saved <S%G4982><s%> you.

And immediately <S%G3916><s%> he received <S%G308><s%> his sight, <S%G308><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him, glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> it, gave <S%G1325><s%> praise <S%G136><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>
